word: IN HER VERY LAST YEARS HER SUPERVISION WAS NOT SO COMPREHENSIVE, BUT SHE WAS MARVELOUSLY BLESSED IN HER INTELLIGENCE IN DIRECTING REGARDING THE MATTER PREVIOUSLY WRITTEN WHICH WAS BEING USED IN HER LAST YEARS AND IN POINTING OUT THOSE SUBJECTS WHICH NEEDED TO BE EMPHASIZED AND THOSE SUBJECTS WHICH COULD BE SPARED AS WE PROCEEDED WITH THE WORK OF ABRIDGMENT OF THE LARGER BOOKS IN PREPARING COPY FOR TRANSLATION INTO FOREIGN TONGUES.
